QuestData.Title: Spoils of War
QuestData.Description:
The warring clans are relentless and our warriors are going through armor faster than I can keep it repaired.
If you find yourself in battle with the other clans, see if you can salvage any undamaged armor pieces from their soldiers. We should not let good resources go to waste.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa pieces of Salvaged Mogu Armor from mogu enemies in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
